plot: "Alright, I give you the runt. But you take care of it, and you kill it in one year" said my uncle.
title: Der kloane
plot_es: "Alright, I give you the runt. But you take care of it, and you kill it in one year" said my uncle.
plot_en: "Alright, I give you the runt. But you take care of it, and you kill it in one year" said my uncle.
